channel.title: Webclient Help
channel.description: Hi, I have a client that's jarred, and ready to be put on a webhost, but I'm really really unfamiliar with how things work on there. I have a 1freehosting account and filezilla, and yeah I just don't know what to do right now. If someone could help me through teamviewer so that I can have voice communication with the person who's helping me, it would be a lot easier. Please reply to this if you think you can help me, I'll pm my teamviewer information.

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

If you own a real domain, i am offering free cPanel hosting (50Spots) i’ll host your website for you.
Use the source code above and make it into an html file.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @nikkidespard nikkidespard
item.description:
@nikkidespard wrote:

Create a new file ( Webclient.html )

Open it up,

Paste a snippet you have or the one below

[b]Server name[/b] html, body {heiht:100%;margin:0 padding:0;} #page-background {position:fixed; top:0; left:0; width:100%; height:100%} #content {position:relative; z-index:1; padding:10px; }
Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/ [b]Chatbox code if you want one here[/b]

Replace all fields I have made bold

Waalaa.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help
